analgesia_standard.default: Paracetamol and/or ibuprofen as directed (if safe for you).
analgesia_standard.helpText: Regular pain relief plus any rescue option if needed.
analgesia_standard.presetDescription: Insert a suggested pain plan and tailor to the patient.

presets.label: Paracetamol + NSAID baseline
presets.value: Paracetamol regularly as directed. Add ibuprofen or another anti-inflammatory with food if safe. Avoid taking more than one anti-inflammatory at the same time.

presets.label: Paracetamol-only plan
presets.value: Paracetamol regularly as directed. Avoid anti-inflammatories if you have been told they are not safe for you (stomach, kidney, or bleeding issues).

presets.label: Opioid rescue only
presets.value: Paracetamol regularly as directed. Use prescribed stronger pain medicine only if pain remains severe after regular analgesia. Do not drive or operate machinery after taking opioid medication.
